HomePage.title: Master Your Habits
HomePage.subtitle: Build the life you want with Cronify.
HomePage.freeForeverDesc: No limits, no premium plans, no tricks. Cronify is completely free.

features.trackingDesc: Track your daily goals with a beautiful, intuitive interface. Mark habits as complete, or log reasons for misses.
features.accountabilityDesc: Share your progress with a partner. They see your wins and your reasons for misses.
features.privacyDesc: You control what you share. Granular permissions for every habit.
features.breakHabitsDesc: Abstinence timers that count every second without relapse. Perfect for quitting addictions.
features.statsDesc: Visualize your progress with charts, streaks, and weekly analysis.

Onboarding.welcomeDesc: Let's quickly show you how to get the most out of tracking your habits.
Onboarding.step1Desc: Build habits are things you want to do daily (exercise, read). Break habits have timers to track how long you've abstained from something (quit smoking, no social media).
Onboarding.step2Desc: Every day, mark your habits as complete or failed. If you fail, you can add a reason to identify patterns later.
Onboarding.step3Desc: Invite a friend or family member to see your progress. Studies show you're 2x more likely to succeed with accountability.
